thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 5 of 110
thread.title: Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text:
This course is great. I have taken it many time and will continue too in 3 year time.
Just one thing I would say, it needs some updating. The drunk driving video is very old and sadly there have been many more accidents that have happened in recent times that people can learn form, especially the younger generations. Also texting is driving is a HUGE issue and I think there needs to be a section devoted to that.
